invasionmod.phantom.cant_place_fire: You can't place fire while invading other worlds!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_break_block: You can't break this block (directly) while invading other world!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_light_creepers: You can't light creepers while invading other world!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_change_spawn: You can't change spawn point while invading other world!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_attack_mobs: You can't attack mobs while invading other world!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_place_non_falli: You can't place non-falling blocks while invading other world!
invasionmod.phantom.cant_use_bucket: You can't use bucket to fill it or place fluids while invading other world!
invasionmod.soul_grabber.should_choose_p: You have to choose target player first!
invasionmod.soul_grabber.only_from_own_w: You can only use that from your own world!
invasionmod.soul_grabber.you_need_portal: You need a valid portal to teleport!
